Human Resources (HR) - People and Growth Lead Job at Ascentech Services Limited




        
    

        
        Ascentech Services Limited is a full-fledged Human Resource Solution Provider incorporated in 2013 with its Head Office in Lagos, Nigeria. We are committed to forging long-term partnerships with our clients by creating and delivering robust and flexible services that address the changing needs of their business.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Human Resources (HR) - People and Growth Lead
Job Location: Porth Harcourt, Rivers
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary
     

            
    




	We're seeking a HR professional to build and lead our talent strategy, foster a high-performance culture, and align hiring with business growth in a health-focused insurtech startup.


Key Responsibilities


	Develop and maintain a strong talent pipeline
	Hire individuals who contribute to business growth
	Shape a culture of speed, learning, ownership, and collaboration
	Implement performance management systems
	Oversee HR operations and compliance


Requirements


	3+ years of experience in HR or people operations
	Strong understanding of performance management and team development
	Excellent communication, leadership, and problem-solving skills
	Experience with HR systems, KPIs, and compliance
	Knowledge of Nigerian labor law and HR best practices.


What We Offer


	Salary: N200,000.00 - N250,000.00 per month
	Opportunity to lead people strategy in a scaling startup
	Direct access to leadership and key growth decisions
	Purpose-led work environment with real impact and innovation
	Autonomy and creativity in shaping team culture.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to cv@ascentech.com.ng using the Job Position as subject of the mail.

title: Job Vacancies at Bukka Hut Restaurant
content:
Bukka Hut Restaurant is a fast-growing organization with almost 20 outlets in Lagos and care greatly about our staff. Beyond hospitality, Bukka Hut thrives as a people-centric brand with a laser focus on championing people empowerment initiatives. We like to view our business sectors as channels used to transform the lives of our stakeholders. This stems from our internal workforce to the community we operate in.

We are recruiting to fill the following positions below:

1.) Restaurant Supervisor

Job Location: Lekki - Jakande, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description
     

            
    




	Be visible in the Front of house to address all customer issues and frontliner are always smiling and well-coordinated.
	Effectively supervises subordinates to ensure that all required products are available in line with the product time-out schedule and are well presented for customers to see.
	Proactively identify and resolves issues that could adversely affect product availability for display.
	Ensure timely requisition of products to avoid outage.
	Effectively supervises staff to prevent product or cash shortage
	Enforce our standard operations procedure and supervises staff for compliance
	Effectively supervises staff to ensure there are no shortages and if there are any shortages, carry out an investigation to identify the causes and resolve immediately.
	Ensure equipment such as microwave, chillers, P.O.S, and computers are well handled by staff to prevent any damages that could affect smooth operations.
	Submit required reports as at when due.
	Ensure shift closing procedure is well observed by checking cash out from cashiers at the end of shifts, ensuring no trash is outside dumpster, turn off TV and/or music, dining area is swept, tables reset and chairs neatly arranged, turn off all light and doors are locked.


Requirements


	Have a Bachelor's Degree or HND in Hospitality or any related field.
	2 - 3 years of work experience in a QSR business.
	Good communication skills.
	Excellent leadership skills.
	Smart and proactiveness.
	Candidates must reside within Lekki and its environment.


Salary
N120,000 - N130,000 Monthly.

Application Closing Date: 15th August, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: careers@bukkahut.com using "Restaurant Supervisor" as the subject of the email.

 

 

2.) Contact Center Agent

Job Location: Lekki, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities


	Make outbound calls and receive inbound calls.
	Take customer orders, process them, and follow up with them.
	Provide exceptional customer service and ensure customer satisfaction.
	Handle customer complaints or inquiries.
	Provide customers with needed information and support.
	Save customers' information in the company database.


Job Requirements


	Candidates should possess a minimum of an OND in any field.
	Minimum of 1 year of work experience in customer service.
	Good communication skills (Verbal and written).


Salary
N100,000 - N106,000 / month.

Application Closing Date: 11th August, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: careers@bukkahut.com using the Job Position and current Location as the subject of the mail.

 

3.) Restaurant Inventory Officer

Job Locations: Lekki, Jakande, Chevron and Yaba - Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Key Responsibilities


	Receive, inspect, and properly store incoming goods and materials
	Maintain accurate inventory records and ensure proper stock levels
	Organize and label inventory in a logical and accessible manner
	Conduct regular stock counts and reconcile discrepancies
	Prepare and maintain inventory reports using inventory management software or Excel
	Ensure cleanliness and safety within the storage area
	Coordinate with procurement and other departments to fulfill supply needs


Requirements


	High School Diploma or equivalent; additional qualifications in store management or logistics are a plus
	1 year of proven experience as a storekeeper or in inventory management
	Proficient in the use of computers, especially MS Excel and inventory software
	Good organizational and communication skills
	Ability to work independently and manage time effectively
	Applicants should be residents of the Island and the Mainland.


Salary
N120,000 - N130,000 Monthly.

Application Closing Date: 10th August, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: careers@bukkahut.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

Note: Only qualified candidates will be contacted.
